name: TheGettysburgian
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Get the latest stories from The Gettysburgian in your Flash Briefing! The Gettysburgian was founded in 1897 and is the official, student-run newspaper of Gettysburg College.

Add The Gettysburgian to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top by going to Settings in the Alexa app after enabling this skill. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Accounts.

After adding The Gettysburgian, you can say things like, "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news?" to access late-breaking information from The Gettysburgian and your other favorite news providers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
